title: The Variable Man and Other Stories
description: Five short novels complete in one volumeThe Variable Man... The man from the past was Earth's last hope in the war with CentaurusSecond Variety... the underground war factories were completely automatic - until they started improving on the designs.The Minority Report... Crime prevention by precognition should have been infallible, but it wasn't.Autofac... The war was over but the machines didn't know it - and nobody knew how to tell them.A World of Talent... They produced the ultimate mutant, but nobody recognised him.
author: Philip K. Dick
